Collaboration with SmartSaha

With the SmartSaha platform, MAD'AROM strengthens the digital traceability of its products and supports producers with personalized agricultural advice. SmartSaha provides producers with real-time access to reliable and localized weather data, integrates climate alerts and carbon compliance to ensure sustainability. It also offers a marketplace that directly connects Malagasy producers with international industries, ensuring quality, transparency, and competitiveness in global markets.

Digital Traceability

Strengthens digital traceability for all MAD'AROM products from farm to market.

Personalized Advice

Offers personalized agricultural advice to producers for optimal crop management.

Weather Intelligence

Provides real-time localized weather data and climate alerts for proactive farming.

Carbon Compliance

Ensures carbon compliance for sustainable operations and environmental responsibility.

Global Marketplace

Hosts a marketplace connecting Malagasy producers directly with international buyers.

Quality Assurance

Guarantees transparency, quality, and global competitiveness for all products.

Visit SmartSaha
